forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 31. West wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers between 8pm and 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
This morning in Boston, a gentle chill lingers in the air, a reminder that winter holds sway over the city. As the sun rises, it peeks through a veil of clouds, casting a soft light that bathes the skyline in hues of muted pink and blue. With temperatures expected to hover close to that desirable warmth of 31 degrees, the day promises a comfortable outing, though the brisk west wind creates a sharp feel against the skin. 

As evening approaches, the clouds may gather, bringing with them a chance of snow showers. There’s an unmistakable coolness that hints at a winter wonderland, even if just momentarily. Dressing in layers will be wise—a sturdy coat, perhaps a scarf to snugly wrap around the neck, and a good pair of boots will prepare you for any slippery spots as the day transitions to night. With a fleeting glance at the forecast, it might be just the day to enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Charles River or to seek warmth in a tucked-away café, sipping on hot cocoa as the faint possibility of snow adds a touch of magic to the ordinary evening.
